function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependency on IoT devices for COVID-19 management","Impact":"Failure to scale IoT devices may lead to ineffective data collection and transmission, hampering COVID-19 management efforts","Mitigation":"Develop scalable IoT solutions and utilize 5G networks to handle increasing device numbers and data transmission","Technologies":"5G, scalable IoT solutions","People":"Healthcare professionals, logistics personnel","Owner":"Technology developers, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Data privacy and security risks with IoT devices","Impact":"Unauthorized access to and tampering with COVID-19 data may compromise containment efforts and patient privacy","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient security algorithms and data encryption to ensure accurate and secure data collection","Technologies":"Energy-efficient security algorithms, data encryption","People":"Healthcare professionals, data privacy experts","Owner":"Technology developers, data privacy experts"}]}
